    Bio

    Dr. Gustavo Pinto is an assistant professor at the Federal University of Pará, Brazil. He works in intersection between people and code. His research has been published in top venues (eg, ICSE, ASE, EMSE). Dr. Pinto holds a PhD in Software Engineering from the Informatics Center at the Federal University of Pernambuco. He has been serving on the program committee of several important conferences and journal.

    Research highlight

    • He (co-)authored 55+ research papers in important ACM/IEEE/SBC venues.
    • His work on energy-aware developers is the most cited paper software engineering paper indexed by CSIndexBR.
    • He won two best papers awards (MSR’17 and VEM’16), and received one nomination to the best paper (ESEM’18).
    • He has served as a member of 35+ program committees for several important ACM/IEEE/SBC venues.
    • He gave 20+ talks about this research work at conferences, workshops, and meetups.
